title: Blood Moon Kennen Missing Ult Particles [Gameplay]
body:
Hey there,

Just played a game against a Kennen with his Blood Moon skin. For some reason, no one on our team, including myself, were able to see his ultimate. You were able to see the lightning strikes from it, but not the actual ring itself. Just a heads up in case either anyone else experienced this or maybe all of us were just crazy

replies.body:
HUHAHAHAH!
*laughs in pikachu*
My plan has worked and now i can conquer all the Tokyo gym badges.

Hello! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of this issue and are investigating! Unfortunately, this is something that doesn't have a 100% repro rate, so it's been a bit more difficult to track down.
